instructions:
In a 6 quart saucepot, sauté the onions, celery and garlic over medium heat in olive oil for about 5
minutes. Add water, wine, tomatoes, potatoes and Bouillabaisse mix. Heat to boiling and simmer for 15
minutes or until potatoes are tender. *(May be frozen at this point.)* Prepare seafood by cooking shrimp and
sautéing the 1-inch cubes of fish or halved sea scallops for about 3 minutes or until opaque. Add seafood and
heat for serving. Makes 6 servings.
ingredients: 1 lb seafood (any combination of cubed haddock,
name: Bouillabaisse
creator: Mary & Jim Decker
